stable.body:
• Full support for scoped storage & folder configuration
• New map list with searching and sorting options
• Show thumbnail of chosen map
• Quickly open/download maps from .zip files and URLs
• Improved UI for wide screens and RTL layouts
• More UI improvements
• Some bug fixes
stable.bodyMarkdown:
## Features
- **l10n**: add Chinese translations [#40](https://github.com/aliernfrog/pf-tool/pull/40) ([alieRN](https://github.com/aliernfrog/pf-tool/commit/ef3d06f2833ed8a9c1164bb1b5e2c143db761ace))

## Chores
- update app version to v1.6.1 (16100) [#41](https://github.com/aliernfrog/pf-tool/pull/41) ([alieRN](https://github.com/aliernfrog/pf-tool/commit/34d1e5c5ddc6220311a251aba5c0fa88d129919e))
- merge branch `dev` into `main` [#41](https://github.com/aliernfrog/pf-tool/pull/41) ([alieRN](https://github.com/aliernfrog/pf-tool/commit/494f30f4718a52836cbba1b7c183296a2e545f62))

View this release on [GitHub](https://github.com/aliernfrog/pf-tool/releases/tag/v1.6.1)
